html.questionText: HTML is what type of language?
html.explanation: TS uses a colon (:) to separate the property name from the property type
enum is not used as a type in TypeScript

html.questionText: the year in which HTML was first proposed
html.explanation: interfaces are typically used to list the properties and methods for an object

html.questionText: Fundamental HTML block is known as
html.explanation: number[] is another way of writing Array<number> in TypeScript

html.questionText: Apart from <b> tag, what other tag makes text bold?
html.explanation: a constructor is used by a class to take in parameters

html.questionText: Which is NOT an access modifier?
html.explanation: async is not used as an access modifier type in HTML

html.questionText: Which keyword allows us to share information between files in TypeScript?
html.explanation: the export keyword allows for the information to be transmitted between files

html.questionText: Which is an array method to generate a new array based on a condition?
html.explanation: filter is a method used to conditionally create a new array

html.questionText: How is a property accessible within a class?
html.explanation: this.propertyName is the way to access a specific property within a class
